sourcesContent:
export const TILESIZE = 60

// Initials
export const WIDTH = 31
export const HEIGHT = 13
export const XPLAYER = 1
export const YPLAYER = 1
export const BOMBS = 1
export const BOMBRANGE = 1
export const ENEMIES = 2
export const XENEMY = 5
export const YENEMY = 5

// Time related constants
export const SECOND = 60
export const BOMBTIME = 3 * SECOND
export const LEVELTIME = 60 * SECOND
export const ADDITIONALTIME = 30 * SECOND
export const COUNTDOWN = 10 * SECOND
export const ENEMYSPEED = SECOND
export const FREEZETIMER = 5 * SECOND



// Probabilities
export const SMARTPROBABILITY = 0.5
export const RANDOMPROBABILITY = 0.2
export const BREAKABLEPROBABILITY = 0.2
export const WATERPROBABILITY = 0.05

// Scores
export const POWERUPSCORE = 20
export const TIMESCORE = 1 // Per second

// Other constants
export const VOLUME = 0.5
export const ADDITIONALENEMIES = 2
export const ZOOMFACTOR = 1.02
export const WATERPROBABILITYAUX = WATERPROBABILITY + BREAKABLEPROBABILITY
